content: मधुर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मधु-मधुर्यं राति रा-क, मधृ-अस्त्यर्ये र वा] {@--1@} Sweet. {@--2@} Honied, mellifluous. {@--3@} Pleasant, charming, attractive, agreeable; अहो मधुरमासां दर्शनं <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 9</ls>; <ls>Māl. 2. 11</ls>; किमिव हि मधुराणां मंडनं नाकृतीनां <ls>Ś. 1. 20.</ls> {@--4@} Melodious (as a sound). --रः {@--1@} The red sugar-cane. {@--2@} Rice. {@--3@} A kind of sugar, molasses (गुड). {@--4@} A kind of mango. {@--5@} Cuminseed. --रा {@--1@} Liquoriee. {@--2@} Sour ricewater. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of the city Mathurā. --री A kind of musical instrument. --रं {@--1@} Sweetness. {@--2@} A sweet drink, syrup. {@--3@} Poison. {@--4@} Tin. --रं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Sweetly, pleasantly, agreeably.
